title: Order icon missions
body: If I use the emote icon or the border icon, can i still do the missions at the same time? Or do I have to use the original order icon you get at the start?

replies.body: Per the [event page FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017), you can use any of the icons tied to your specific side.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Now that the VS event has ended...any way to get the final Order icon as well? :D

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qo76vTf8wOk/WS9DHzVkkzI/AAAAAAABDuI/BXhrAKvmuLk4tn7BPjWbarrtyxLwi5FRACLcB/s1600/fc42083b7079ae68.jpg https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e5YCSodc-WQ/WS9DHrqKvQI/AAAAAAABDt4/bHs_cPtB_PIxTcIvUd5nICH2AEgUbFozQCLcB/s1600/8900cfa59b38e074.jpg

It's already made, and it is SO much better than the...Volcanic Wukong one! 
_1500 IP like back at Lunar Revel 2014 and the other "Path" icons, please?_
yep, mission progress counts with icons equipped which can be bought with the specific tokens.
